::DarkMouse::

Little One, she thought. She clentched her teeth trying not to say something 
that might anger Megatron.  She stood there and glared at him for his 
comment of 'Little One'.  She may have been a mouse, but this mouse could 
fight. She looked at Megatron and stood down.  She was there to help protect 
her leader.  She took two steps back but stayed close to Megatron


----Original Message----
From: Roaklin  <roaklin@y...>
Date: Wed Jul 5, 2000 6:38pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


"Little one don't worry," Panzertron said to the
smaller transfomer standing next to Megatron," You
aren't part of my mission. Therefore unless you attack
me, I won't attack you."

"That's not very predicon like of you," one of them
said.

"I'm a soilder, not a monster," Panzertron
said,"Thou sometimes I work for monsters."
